content:
May 13-15 2017: Maria Ressa was in VIETNAM for APEC Women in STEM.

May 15, 2017: Stolen documents were uploaded by OceanLotus, also known as APT32, a Vietnamese hacker's group.

May 24, 2017: One of the CLASSIFIED transcripts were co-PUBLISHED by RAPPLER.

June 1, 2017: CyberScoop reported a VIETNAM-linked hacker group breached into DFAs system to acquire CLASSIFIED TRANSCRIPT.

title: Maria Ressa was in Vietnam when the stolen confidential documents were uploaded by a Vietnamese hacker's group
